Last update [ff0deec...3f3bd5b](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/compare/ff0deecbc8f8e9ae3d274e5e7cd7c0056de1a6c2...3f3bd5bef714706ad7ef64af1443b3b161c9da26?el=footer&src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

looks ok to me. but you can certainly add this as a test if you'd like.

pls create a new issue if you'd like to add a test.
